```{r}
quartile_table_A <- quartile_table |>
  dplyr::select(
    violent_quartile,
    Mean_violent_crime,
    Mean_property_crime,
    Log_GDP,
    Inequality_top10,
    Unemployment,
    Poverty
  )

quartile_table_A |>
  knitr::kable(
    caption = "Contemporary characteristics by violent crime quartile (2015–2018) — Panel A: crime and economic conditions",
    digits = 2,
    booktabs = TRUE
  ) |>
  kableExtra::kable_styling(
    latex_options = "HOLD_position",
    position = "center"
  )
```
